# shared

**Type Property**

The singleton app instance.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var shared: UIApplication { get }
```

## Return Value

The app instance is created in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplicationMain(_:_:_:_:)-1yub7] function.

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplicationMain(_:_:_:_:)-1yub7] function creates the shared app instance at launch time.
